message: Let's split the money equally. It's fair and ensures we both get a share.
I think a 60/40 split is more fair, considering you'll get a better deal with the inflation advantage. Let's make this quick!
Considering the inflation, I propose a 60/40 split in favor of Bob to compensate for the diminishing value of our money. Let's aim for a compromise.
I'm willing to go up to 70/30, but I think it's time to settle this. We're both losing money with every passing round!
